page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT Unemployment
page.content: The level of unemployment in Cleveland is the highest in Britain,except for parts of Northern Ireland.{Thornaby} has a very high level of unemployment because some large firms have closed down or reduced the number of workers they employ. One of the biggest firms in the area was{Head Wrightsons}and it is now closed. Many people in{Thornaby who worked for{British Steel}or the{ {Imperial Chemical Industries}have lost their jobs.It is very difficult for young people to get a job when they leave school.Some of them are trained for a year on the {Youth Training {Scheme,}but when the training finishes many of them become unemployed. Some people think that young people cause vandalism and behave badly because they haven't a job to keep them busy, and they are short of money.
